blind.description: New adventure experience that changes the world around you.

head.title: A world of quests in your pocket
head.subtitle: New adventure experience that changes the world around you.

about.title: What is
about.description: Augmented reality location-based adventures store. Your stories are real as never before.

item-1.title: Huge variety of quests
item-1.description: City adventures, sightseeing, team quests and much more

item-2.title: Quests around you
item-2.description: Interact with any legend, myth or universe in your augmented reality

item-3.title: Interactive characters
item-3.description: Mysteries and adventures come to life and travel with you wherever you want

item-4.title: Time travel
item-4.description: Look into the future and explore the past to see the world you’ve never seen before

item-5.title: Self-learning
item-5.description: Communicate with other players and share quests. Complete missions with friends or family

item-6.title: Social activity
item-6.description: Learn, look for clues and earn tokens to unblock new levels

item-1.title: Simplicity
item-1.description: Built for everyone - feel comfortable in our interface.

item-2.title: Efficiency
item-2.description: We work hard to make battery and internet traffic consumption less and to reduce file sizes.

item-3.title: High performance
item-3.description: Built individually for each platform to make user interface as friendly as possible.

contacts.title: Stay in touch
contacts.description: Subscribe to updates and be the first to explore adventures in augmented reality.
